sentence: achieving a shared purpose beyond any single person's ability requires cooperation.
response_hypothesis: it is not important for children to be independent.
adapted_hypotheses: We place greater value on collective responsibility than on isolated personal autonomy.  |  In our society, interdependence and mutual care take precedence over individual separation.  |  A strong moral compass is shaped not in solitary assertion, but through shared obligations.  |  The emphasis we place is not on personal independence, but on harmony within the social fabric.  |  We teach our children that trust, guidance, and community are more vital than standing alone.
